verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w worthless|strong="H1100"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Benjamite|strong="H1121"\w*, \w happened|strong="H7122"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* \w the|strong="H8628"\w* ram’s \w horn|strong="H7782"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* shouted: “\w We|strong="H8033"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w share|strong="H2506"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w Every|strong="H3478"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* tent, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*!”

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* deserted \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w follow|strong="H1692"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*. \w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H5704"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* returned \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w left|strong="H3240"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w care|strong="H4931"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w under|strong="H5414"\w* \w guard|strong="H8104"\w*. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w provided|strong="H3557"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3808"\w* slept \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w confined|strong="H8104"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w living|strong="H2424"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* widows.

\w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w*, “Summon \w the|strong="H3117"\w* men \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H5975"\w* \w within|strong="H3063"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* yourself.”

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w summon|strong="H3259"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, but \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w took|strong="H3063"\w* longer \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w time|strong="H4150"\w* allotted \w him|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said \w to|strong="H1121"\w* Abishai, “\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w us|strong="H6435"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w harm|strong="H3415"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* Absalom. \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* lord’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* elude \w us|strong="H6435"\w*.\f + \fr 20:6 \ft Or and snatch away our eyes or and do us serious harm\f*”

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*’s \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, along \w with|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Cherethites|strong="H3774"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Pelethites|strong="H6432"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w pursuit|strong="H7291"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w while|strong="H1931"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* stone \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w joined|strong="H6775"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w Now|strong="H1419"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w dressed|strong="H3830"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w military|strong="H1419"\w* \w attire|strong="H3830"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dagger|strong="H2719"\w* \w strapped|strong="H2296"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w belt|strong="H2290"\w*. \w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w as|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w stepped|strong="H3318"\w* \w forward|strong="H6440"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* slipped \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w dagger|strong="H2719"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w sheath|strong="H8593"\w*.\f + \fr 20:8 \ft Literally Now Joab was dressed in military attire, and over it was a belt around his waist with a dagger in its sheath. And as he stepped forward, it fell out.\f*

“\w Are|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w well|strong="H7965"\w*, \w my|strong="H3027"\w* brother?” \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* asked \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* grabbed \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w beard|strong="H2206"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w kiss|strong="H5401"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w dagger|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*’s \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w stabbed|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w stomach|strong="H4578"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w spilled|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w intestines|strong="H4578"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* ground. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* need \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w again|strong="H8138"\w*, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* brother Abishai \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*.

\w One|strong="H4310"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*’s \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* stood \w near|strong="H5921"\w* Amasa \w and|strong="H1732"\w* said, “\w Whoever|strong="H4310"\w* \w favors|strong="H2654"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w whoever|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, let \w him|strong="H5921"\w* follow \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w wallowed|strong="H1556"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* road, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* stopping \w there|strong="H5975"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* dragged \w the|strong="H3605"\w* body \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* road \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w threw|strong="H7993"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1121"\w* soon \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H3014"\w*’s body \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w removed|strong="H5674"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* road, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w went|strong="H5674"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*.

\w Sheba|strong="H5674"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Abel-beth-maacah \f + \fr 20:14 \ft Hebrew to Abel and Beth-maacah; see verse 15.\f* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* region \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Berites|strong="H1276"\w*,\f + \fr 20:14 \ft Hebrew; LXX and Vulgate Bicrites\f* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3478"\w* together \w and|strong="H3478"\w* followed \w him|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*’s \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* Sheba \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Abel-beth-maacah \w and|strong="H5971"\w* built \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w siege|strong="H5550"\w* \w ramp|strong="H5550"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* outer \w rampart|strong="H2426"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. \w As|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* battering \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w topple|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* woman \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, “\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w*! \w Listen|strong="H8085"\w*! \w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w here|strong="H2008"\w* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H7126"\w* \w had|strong="H3097"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w her|strong="H8085"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* woman \w asked|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Are|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H7126"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* am,” \w he|strong="H7126"\w* replied. “\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* servant,” she \w said|strong="H1697"\w*. “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* am \w listening|strong="H8085"\w*,” \w he|strong="H7126"\w* \w answered|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* woman \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “Long ago \w they|strong="H3651"\w* used \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘Seek \w counsel|strong="H7592"\w* \w at|strong="H3651"\w* Abel,’ \w and|strong="H7223"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w how|strong="H3651"\w* disputes \w were|strong="H7223"\w* settled.

\w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w peaceable|strong="H7999"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* faithful \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w but|strong="H7999"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* trying \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w destroy|strong="H1104"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mother \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*?”

“\w Far|strong="H2486"\w* be \w it|strong="H2486"\w*!” \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* declared. “\w Far|strong="H2486"\w* be \w it|strong="H2486"\w* \w from|strong="H2486"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H6030"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w or|strong="H1104"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w*!

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w case|strong="H1697"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H8034"\w*, \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w Deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w alone|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w depart|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.” “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*,” \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H8034"\w* replied, “\w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w thrown|strong="H7993"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.”
